mapper.insert: INSERT INTO contents(contentsno, adminno, fcateno, title, content, passwd, word, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, rdate) VALUES(contents_seq.nextval, #{adminno}, #{fcateno}, #{title}, #{content}, #{passwd}, #{word}, #{file1}, #{file1saved}, #{thumb1}, #{size1}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT contentsno, adminno, fcateno, title, content, recom, cnt, replycnt, passwd, word, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1 FROM contents ORDER BY contentsno DESC
SELECT contentsno, adminno, fcateno, title, content, recom, cnt, replycnt, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1 FROM contents WHERE fcateno = #{fcateno} ORDER BY contentsno DESC
SELECT contentsno, adminno, fcateno, title, content, recom, cnt, replycnt, passwd, word, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, map, youtube FROM contents WHERE contentsno = #{contentsno}
mapper.update: UPDATE contents SET map=#{map} WHERE contentsno=#{contentsno}
UPDATE contents SET youtube=#{youtube} WHERE contentsno=#{contentsno}
